about_the_game:
This DLC changes default game to fever game and adds Plate 36.
Fever game means that the game has additional fever time by earning fever points.

Player can get fever points by making combo.

This DLC is available in online play ( Steam Client is connecting to Steam )
detailed_description:
This DLC changes default game to fever game and adds Plate 36.
Fever game means that the game has additional fever time by earning fever points.

Player can get fever points by making combo.

This DLC is available in online play ( Steam Client is connecting to Steam )
name: SUIKA DISH Fever DLC
